content:
I just discovered and started using Rambox today: https://rambox.pro/#ce Seems pretty good. Save me running Gitter, Zulip, Slack, Messenger, etc., can just have all those things open in the one program now.

Rambox - Boost your productivity
Rambox is a workspace browser that allows you to manage as many applications as you want, all in one place. It is perfect for people who care about productivity and work with many applications, both business and personal
I know @klonos uses something similar for Mac (Station, I think).

Hello :wave: ...yep, I was initially using https://meetfranz.com but switched to https://getstation.com when Franz decided to commercialize and was demanding an account with them :thumbs_down: ...I could never get MS Teams to work with it though (the Dept. of Finance in AU is using that - they are running GovCMS, which the company I work for provides support for) ...it may be that the 2FA thingy is the culprit.

Franz – a free messaging app for Slack, Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, Telegram and more
Franz is a free messaging app /former emperor of Austria, that combines chat & messaging services into one application.
Station • One app to rule them all
Station unifies all your work tools in one neat and productive interface.
...I may give Rambox a go to see if it works better. Thanks @BWPanda (Peter) ++
...nope; same issue with MS Teams authentication :disappointed: ...must be something with the Teams API I guess.
